name: Skippa
description:
A short puzzlescript game about blocks that move 2 spaces when pushed with goal being to destroy all the blocks.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=19e7afe21a06ab39feaa33b126279ec4

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=19e7afe21a06ab39feaa33b126279ec4

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
